book_name: An Elegant Puzzle - Systems of Engineering Management - by Will Larson.pdf
summary: In this chapter, the focus is on the strategy of consolidating resources to achieve durable excellence within teams. Leaders often face the challenge of limited resources and the temptation to distribute them evenly. However, the author advocates for prioritizing one team at a time to ensure they can grow and gel effectively. This method may seem slow but yields long-lasting improvements in happiness and productivity. Ultimately, the goal is to create an environment where excellence is sustained and capable of compounding over time.

slides.section_body: As a leader, you'll face the challenge of managing multiple teams at different stages. Distributing limited resources evenly across all teams can lead to stagnation. Prioritize one team at a time to ensure meaningful progress and avoid the pitfalls of indecision. This approach fosters growth and clarity in your organizational strategy.
slides.quote: It's not fair if no one gets anything at all.

slides.section_body: Many leaders fall into the trap of 'peanut buttering' resources, spreading them too thin. This approach leads to mediocrity and frustration within teams. It's essential to recognize that equity in resource allocation doesn't equate to fairness. Focus on impactful investments.
slides.quote: Indecision framed as fairness often results in no substantial outcome.

slides.section_body: Concentrate your efforts on one team until it is stable and thriving before moving to the next. This transition allows each team to achieve a critical mass, enabling them to tackle challenges effectively. This shift in focus contributes positively to the overall health of the organization.
slides.quote: Prioritize one team at a time to create lasting improvements.

slides.section_body: Bringing new members into a team can disrupt group dynamics. Instead of continuous hiring, adopt a model of rapid growth followed by consolidation periods where teams can gel. This method enhances collaboration and strengthens relationships within teams.
slides.quote: Growth needs to be balanced with periods of consolidation for team effectiveness.

slides.section_title: SLOW AND STEADY WINS THE RACE
slides.section_body: Durable excellence requires a committed, steady approach rather than quick fixes. Changing the pace of growth, allowing time for teams to mature, leads to sustainable productivity and satisfaction. This strategy enables improvements to stick and flourish over time.
slides.quote: Enduring, real improvements are not the result of quick fixes.

slides.section_body: The journey towards durable excellence is about nurturing teams consistently. Efforts should be focused on deep, meaningful improvements rather than surface-level changes. Such a strategy ensures that everyone feels invested in the success of the organization.
slides.quote: Improvements should compound to create a culture of durable excellence.

slides.section_body: Focusing on stable growth leads to happier teams. A content workforce is more productive and engaged, contributing to the overall success of the organization. By prioritizing the well-being of teams, leaders can harness higher throughput and morale.

The efforts made towards improving a team's dynamics lead to compounded results over time. As teams become more effective, their output and satisfaction increase, demonstrating that investment in team dynamics pays off exponentially.
slides.quote: The effects of nurturing teams compound as time progresses.

slides.section_body: Organizations should cultivate an environment that embraces continuous improvement. By focusing on durable excellence, teams can thrive and organically grow while retaining stability during transitions. This culture promotes resilience and adaptability.
slides.quote: Continuous growth fuels the spirit of excellence.

slides.section_body: Durable excellence is not a destination, but a journey that requires commitment and strategic focus. Leaders must remain consistent in their efforts to nurture teams and drive sustained improvements. This perspective transforms the organization into a model of enduring success.
slides.quote: Excellence is a continuous journey of growth and collaboration.
